contract_errors.BURN_LOCKED_TOKEN: Burn tokens on transferLocked token. The issuer must `unlock` first.
contract_errors.BURN_UNKNOWN_SYMBOL: Attempting to burn a token unknown to this contract
contract_errors.COMPLETEWORK_WRONG_STATE: Worker proposal can only be completed from work_in_progress state
contract_errors.CREATEPROP_DUPLICATE_ID: A Proposal with the id already exists. Try again with a different id.
contract_errors.CREATEPROP_INVALID_PAY_AMOUNT: Invalid pay amount. Must be greater than 0.
contract_errors.FINALIZE_INSUFFICIENT_VOTES: Insufficient votes on worker proposal to be finalized.
contract_errors.FINALIZE_WRONG_STATE: Proposal is not in the pending_finalize state therefore cannot be finalized.
contract_errors.GENERAL_MEMBER_HAS_NOT_AGREED_TO_ANY_TER: Account has not agreed to any terms
contract_errors.GENERAL_REG_MEMBER_NOT_FOUND: Account is not registered with members.
contract_errors.ISSUE_NON_EXISTING_SYMBOL: token with symbol does not exist, create token before issue
contract_errors.MEMBERUNREG_ACTIVE_CANDIDATE: An active candidate must resign their nomination as candidate before being able to unregister from the members.
contract_errors.NEWMEMTERMS_DUPLICATE_TERMS: Next member terms cannot be duplicate of the latest.
contract_errors.NEWMEMTERMS_EMPTY_HASH: Member terms document hash cannot be empty.
contract_errors.NEWMEMTERMS_HASH_TOO_LONG: Member terms document hash should be less than 32 characters long.
contract_errors.NEWMEMTERMS_TERMS_TOO_LONG: Member terms document url should be less than 256 characters long.
contract_errors.NEWPERIOD_EARLY: New period is being called too soon. Wait until the period has completed.
contract_errors.NEWPERIOD_EXPECTED_CAND_NOT_FOUND: Corrupt data: Trying to set a lockup delay on candidate leaving office.
contract_errors.NEWPERIOD_VOTER_ENGAGEMENT_LOW_ACTIVATE: Voter engagement is insufficient to activate the DAC.
contract_errors.NOMINATECAND_ALREADY_REGISTERED: Candidate is already registered and active.
contract_errors.NOMINATECAND_PAY_LIMIT_EXCEEDED: Requested pay limit for a candidate was exceeded.
contract_errors.NOMINATECAND_STAKING_FUNDS_INCOMPLETE: A registering candidate must transfer sufficient tokens to the contract for staking.
contract_errors.REMOVECUSTODIAN_NOT_CURRENT_CUSTODIAN: The entered account name is not for a current custodian.
contract_errors.STARTWORK_WRONG_STATE: Proposal not found.Proposal is not in the pending approval state therefore cannot start work.
contract_errors.UNLOCK_NON_EXISTING_SYMBOL: token with symbol does not exist, create token before unlock
contract_errors.UNSTAKE_CANNOT_UNSTAKE_FROM_ACTIVE_CAND: Cannot unstake tokens for an active candidate. Call withdrawcand first.
contract_errors.UNSTAKE_CANNOT_UNSTAKE_UNDER_TIME_LOCK: Cannot unstake tokens before they are unlocked from the time delay.
contract_errors.UPDATEBIO_BIO_SIZE_TOO_LONG: The bio should be less than 256 characters.
contract_errors.UPDATECONFIG_INVALID_AUTH_HIGH_TO_NUM_EL: The auth threshold can never be satisfied with a value greater than the number of elected custodians
contract_errors.UPDATECONFIG_INVALID_AUTH_MID_TO_LOW_AUT: The low auth threshold cannot be greater than the mid auth threshold.
contract_errors.UPDATECONFIG_INVALID_CONTRACT: Invalid contract attempt to be set for notifying.
contract_errors.UPDATEREQPAY_EXCESS_MAX_PAY: Requested pay amount limit for a candidate was exceeded.
contract_errors.UPDATETERMS_NO_EXISTING_TERMS: Existing terms not found for the given ID
contract_errors.VOTECUST_DUPLICATE_VOTES: Added duplicate votes for the same candidate.
contract_errors.VOTECUST_MAX_VOTES_EXCEEDED: Max number of allowed votes was exceeded.
contract_errors.VOTECUST_VOTING_FOR_INACTIVE_CAND: Attempting to vote for an inactive candidate.
contract_errors.VOTEPROP_INVALID_PROPOSAL_STATE: Invalid proposal state to accept votes.
contract_errors.VOTEPROP_INVALID_VOTE: Invalid vote for the current proposal state.

default.constitution_has_been_updated: The Constitution has been updated. Please sign the updated Constitution to use the Member Client.
default.you_have_not_yet_registered: You have not been registered as a Member yet. Please sign the constitution to use the Member Client.

manage_candidateship.page_description_active_custodian: You are currently active as an {dacname} custodian board member.
manage_candidateship.page_description_registered: Thank you for registering as a candidate to serve on the {dacname} custodian board. As part of your candidacy registration, some of your tokens have been staked.
manage_candidateship.page_description_unregistered: This page is for registering as a candidate for a position on the custodian board. This position comes with responsibiliies outlined in the {dacname} Constitution. Please, do not register as a candidate unless you fully understand and can meet the responsibilites of an {dacname} custodian board member. Please review section 5 of the constitution carefully before registering.
manage_candidateship.pay_description: Please fill in The amount you want to receive for being a custodian during one period. The maximum amount is {requested_pay}.
manage_candidateship.stake_description: Please specify the amount of tokens you want to stake. The minimum amount is {minimum_stake}.

markdown_viewer.select_text_to_edit: Highlight the text you want to edit.

msig_creator.json_description: For convenience the action data is shown in hex and plain text.
msig_creator.step5_desc: Please review your msig carefully. You can jump back and forth to make changes.

vote_custodians.description_main: The Custodian Board manages the operations and affairs of the DAC, including but not limited to the governance and administration of the assets and liabilities of the DAC. The following DAC members have vested some of their tokens to submit themselves and candidates for a position on the custodian board which last for 7 days. Every 7 days, your votes are recalculated to select who will be part of the next custodian board. Voting is important! Please vote often and stay engaged within the DAC to know who is providing value.
vote_custodians.description_side: You can vote for up to {maxvotes} custodian candidates at a time. Please select candidates who you think will bring value to {dacname}.
vote_custodians.voting_disabled_text: Voting is currently disabled. You are able to test out the graphical interface but your votes won't be submitted to the chain. Voting will be enabled shortly.

votingprogress.activated_at: The DAC will be activated at 15%
votingprogress.threshold_met: Voting threshold of 15% met. eosDac is unlocked.
